actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-968.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for assistance for highway relocation regarding the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park in Georgia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for the National Park Service to assist Georgia in relocating a highway affecting the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for assistance for highway relocation regarding the Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park in Georgia, and for other purposes.
